title: fun fact
body: if you chase tanks for long enough in ranked games, you will follow them all the way to bronze V (try it, it works 100%)

replies.body: I once followed Singed all the way to surrender.
nah don't worry i got it man :D

Maybe because he's too frustrated with playing with bots (you) that he thinks by going into B5 he is doing a favour for the greater good of LoL's community, since he at least brings down a bot with him.
